content: 222221112211c,12211c,1312b224,141232a15151212134637844453916416311744126434512† Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Synthesis, characterization, and additional structural and magnetic data. See DOI: 10.1039/b714678g‡ Synthesis of 1 and 2: An aqueous solution (4 ml) of H2cpdc (20 mg) was adjusted to pH = 7 by dilute NaOH solution, then solid MCl2·nH2O (24 mg, M = Co, n = 6; 20 mg, M = Mn, n = 4) was added and stirred for 20 min. The mixture was transferred to a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel and heated to 110 °C for 72 h, and then cooled to room temperature. Light yellow block crystals of 1 (yield: 53%) and red block crystals of 2 (yield: 38%) were obtained. EA: Calc. for C12H18Mn3N4O181: C, 21.48; H, 2.70; N, 8.35. Found: C, 21.90; H, 2.90; N, 8.64%. Calc. for C12H18Co3N4O182: C, 21.10; H, 2.66; N, 8.20. Found: C, 20.45; H, 2.87; N, 7.77%.

† Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Synthesis, characterization, and additional structural and magnetic data. See DOI: 10.1039/b714678g

‡ Synthesis of 1 and 2: An aqueous solution (4 ml) of H2cpdc (20 mg) was adjusted to pH = 7 by dilute NaOH solution, then solid MCl2⋅nH2O (24 mg, M = Co, n = 6; 20 mg, M = Mn, n = 4) was added and stirred for 20 min. The mixture was transferred to a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel and heated to 110 °C for 72 h, and then cooled to room temperature. Light yellow block crystals of 1 (yield: 53%) and red block crystals of 2 (yield: 38%) were obtained. EA: Calc. for C12H18Mn3N4O181: C, 21.48; H, 2.70; N, 8.35. Found: C, 21.90; H, 2.90; N, 8.64%. Calc. for C12H18Co3N4O182: C, 21.10; H, 2.66; N, 8.20. Found: C, 20.45; H, 2.87; N, 7.77%.
